item.title: 受中国和美国拖累，梅赛德斯-奔驰第三季度销量下滑
item.description: 本周二，梅赛德斯-奔驰公司公布了第三季度销售额下降的报告，原因是美国的进口关税和中国市场竞争的加剧削弱了这家德国豪华汽车制造商的交付能力。【原文：Mercedes-Benz reported declining sales for the third quarter on Tuesday, as U.S. import duties and intensifying competition in China dented the German luxury carmaker's deliveries.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商购买了价值 380 亿美元的美国及盟国工具，法律界人士认为这是政策失效的迹象
item.description: 根据美国国会两党议员的一项调查，美国及其盟国在限制中国制造先进计算芯片的能力方面存在漏洞，这使得中国得以购买近 400 亿美元的尖端芯片制造设备。【原文：Gaps in efforts by the U.S. and allies to restrict China's ability to manufacture advanced computing chips have allowed China to buy nearly $40 billion of sophisticated chipmaking gear, according to a bipartisan investigation by U.S. lawmakers.】

item.title: 凯雷发布影子劳工报告，显示 9 月份美国招聘低迷
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周二公布了一组美国经济数据，其中包括大幅调低的 9 月份就业增长预估值，这凸显了私营企业在政府停摆导致官方统计数据停滞不前的情况下提供见解的努力。【原文：Carlyle Group released a set of U.S. economic data on Tuesday, including a sharply lower estimate for September jobs growth, underscoring efforts by private firms to provide insights as the government shutdown stalls official statistics.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命罗伯托-霍恩韦格（Roberto Hoornweg）为企业与投资银行部主管
item.description: 渣打银行周二表示，已任命罗伯托-霍恩韦格（Roberto Hoornweg）为企业与投资银行业务首席执行官，将他从与苏尼尔-考沙尔（Sunil Kaushal）共同担任的联合主管职位上提升了一级。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Tuesday it appointed Roberto Hoornweg as chief executive of corporate and investment banking, elevating him from the co-head role he shared with Sunil Kaushal.】

item.title: OpenAI 禁止疑似与中国有关联的账户寻求监控建议
item.description: OpenAI 周二表示，在用户提出监控社交媒体对话的建议后，它已封禁了几个疑似与中国政府实体有关联的 ChatGPT 账户。【原文：OpenAI said on Tuesday it has banned several ChatGPT accounts with suspected links to the Chinese government entities after the users asked for proposals to monitor social media conversations.】

item.title: 解说：在美国政府关门之际，企业如何引导 IPO 计划
item.description: 希望避免因美国政府停摆而影响其首次公开募股的公司可以利用一项条款，该条款允许这些公司在无需监管部门批准的情况下推进其上市计划。【原文：Companies looking to sidestep disruptions caused by the U.S. government shutdown to their initial public offerings can tap a provision that allows them to press ahead with their listing plans without the need for regulatory approvals.】

item.title: 独家报道法国建议取消对欧元区顶级银行的部分资本要求
item.description: 路透社看到的一份文件显示，法国正在推动取消对欧元区顶级贷款机构的一些资本要求，以使它们与美国的竞争对手处于平等地位。【原文：France is pushing to scrap some capital requirements on the euro zone's top lenders to put them on an equal footing with their U.S. rivals, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 新卫星工厂将在意大利开业，以提高生产能力
item.description: 意大利航天局和泰雷兹阿莱尼亚航天公司（意大利航空航天集团莱昂纳多和法国泰雷兹公司的合资企业）将于今年年底在欧洲最大的卫星制造中心之一开始运营。【原文：Italy's space agency and Thales Alenia Space, a joint venture between Italian aerospace group Leonardo and France's Thales , will begin operations at one of Europe's largest satellite manufacturing centres by the end of this year.】

item.title: 抗议之后赫德贝公司恢复秘鲁矿山运营
item.description: 加拿大矿业公司赫德贝矿业公司（Hudbay Minerals）周二表示，该公司在秘鲁康斯坦西亚（Constancia）矿区的运营已经恢复。【原文：Canadian miner Hudbay Minerals said on Tuesday it has resumed operations at its Constancia mine in Peru, weeks after halting output due to local protests and blockades that had disrupted access to the site.】

item.title: 消息人士称，玛氏将获得欧盟无条件批准 360 亿美元的凯拉诺瓦交易
item.description: 三位直接了解此事的人士称，糖果和零食巨头玛氏以 360 亿美元收购品客（Pringles）生产商凯兰诺华（Kellanova）的出价将获得欧盟无条件的反垄断批准，从而扫清一大障碍。【原文：Candy and snacks giant Mars' $36 billion bid to acquire Pringles maker Kellanova is set to clear a major hurdle by winning unconditional European Union antitrust approval, three people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛集团表示，系统性对冲基金在 10 月份遭遇每日亏损
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份客户报告，自 10 月份以来，系统性对冲基金每天都在亏损。【原文：Systematic hedge funds have lost money every day since October began, according to a Goldman Sachs client note.】

item.title: 比特币再创新高，全球加密 ETF 吸引创纪录的 59.5 亿美元资金
item.description: 追踪加密资产的交易所交易基金（ETF）上周在全球范围内吸引了创纪录的 59.5 亿美元资金流入，因为对数字资产的强劲需求助推比特币创下历史新高。【原文：Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tracking crypto assets drew record inflows of $5.95 billion globally last week, as strong demand for digital assets helped propel bitcoin to an all-time high.】

item.title: 据渣打银行估计，未来三年稳定币可能从新兴市场银行吸走 1 万亿美元的资金
item.description: 据渣打银行（Standard Chartered）的一份报告估计，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的加密货币政策帮助下，美元支持的稳定币的繁荣可能会在未来几年内从新兴经济体银行吸走价值 1 万亿美元的存款。【原文：The boom in U.S. dollar-backed stablecoins, helped by Donald Trump's crypto policies, could suck $1 trillion worth of deposits out of emerging economy banks in the next few years, a report from Standard Chartered estimates.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司努力重启埃尔塞贡多炼油厂火灾后的装置
item.description: 雪佛龙（Chevron）公司周二表示，该公司正在努力重启因上周埃尔塞贡多炼油厂火灾而关闭的部分加工装置。【原文：Chevron on Tuesday said it is working to restart some of the processing units that were shut down due to a fire at its El Segundo refinery last week.】

item.title: 早间竞标：人工智能和交易热潮淹没政治
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 石油供应过剩担忧加剧，欧佩克+暂时限制产量增长
item.description: 欧佩克+"产油国集团内部消息人士称，由于担心可能出现全球供应过剩，欧佩克+产油国只选择小幅提高11月份的产量，因为非欧佩克供应也会增加，同时燃料需求增长放缓。【原文：OPEC+ oil-producing countries opted for only a modest rise to November output due to concerns about a potential global glut, sources within the group said, as non-OPEC supply also rises while fuel demand growth slows.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，纽交所母公司接近达成 20 亿美元收购 Polymarket 股份的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，纽约证券交易所的母公司洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange）正在洽谈向预测市场平台 Polymarket 投资 20 亿美元。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange , the parent of New York Stock Exchange, is in talks to invest $2 billion in predictions market platform Polymarket, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 宜家收购美国物流技术公司 Locus，推动在线业务增长
item.description: 宜家家居（IKEA）和美国物流技术公司Locus周二表示，两家公司已经收购了美国物流技术公司Locus，这家瑞典家具零售商称，随着宜家投资扩大网上销售，这项交易将使其向购物者的送货更加顺畅和快捷。【原文：IKEA has acquired U.S. logistics technology firm Locus, the two companies said on Tuesday, a deal the Swedish furniture retailer said would make its deliveries to shoppers smoother and faster as it invests to expand online sales.】

item.title: 瓦卡穆埃尔塔石油开采活动放缓可能对阿根廷米莱公司构成挑战
item.description: 阿根廷的瓦卡穆埃尔塔（Vaca Muerta）是世界第四大非常规石油储量区，但由于油价下跌和成本上升，该地区的钻井和压裂活动正趋于平稳。【原文：Drilling and fracking activity in Argentina's Vaca Muerta, the world's fourth-largest unconventional oil reserve, is plateauing due to lower oil prices and rising costs, a slowdown that could complicate the political agenda of libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在华尔街反弹后降温，交易员等待美联储提示
item.description: 美国股指期货周二下滑，原因是在标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下收盘纪录新高一天后，投资者开始感到疲惫，现在的焦点已转移到美联储的一系列发言人身上，以寻找政策信号。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Tuesday as investor fatigue set in a day after the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq hit record closing highs, with focus now shifting to a slate of Federal Reserve speakers for policy signals.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，美国正在权衡出售 1.6 万亿美元联邦学生贷款组合中的部分贷款
item.description: 据 Politico 周二援引三位知情人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府正在酝酿将联邦政府 1.6 万亿美元学生贷款组合的一部分出售给私人市场的方案。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is mulling options to sell off parts of the federal government's $1.6 trillion student loan portfolio to the private market, Politico reported on Tuesday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本市场似曾相识，安倍晋三的弟子高市赢得选举令投资者震惊
item.description: 高市真奈出人意料地胜出，成为日本下一任首相，这让投资者怀疑，这位已故安倍晋三的门生是否会带来类似的刺激政策，从而可能提振股市，但使日元变得脆弱。【原文：Sanae Takaichi's surprise victory to become Japan's next prime minister has left investors wondering whether the protégé of the late Shinzo Abe could usher in similar stimulus policies that may boost stocks but leave the yen fragile.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度航空客机紧急系统故障后，印度要求波音公司提供详细信息
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的政府消息人士称，在印度航空公司一架 787 Dreamliner 上周六启动紧急供电系统后，印度航空安全监管机构已要求波音公司提供更多信息。【原文：India's air safety regulator has sought more information from Boeing Co after an emergency power system was activated on an Air India 787 Dreamliner on Saturday, a government source with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 空客 A320 取代波音 737 成为历史上交付量最多的喷气式飞机
item.description: 周二，欧洲空中客车公司（Airbus）的 A320 系列飞机超越波音 737，成为历史上交付量最大的喷气式客机。【原文：Europe's Airbus broke a major commercial barrier on Tuesday when its A320 family of planes overtook the Boeing 737 to become the most-delivered jetliner in history.】

item.title: 油价下跌加剧了对大石油公司臃肿薪酬的关注
item.description: 分析师说，全球五大石油巨头正在削减成本、工作岗位和股票回购，因为油价下跌有可能使股东在不增加债务的情况下无法持续获得派息。【原文：The five biggest global oil majors are moving to cut costs, jobs and share buybacks as falling oil prices threaten to make shareholder payouts unsustainable without increasing debt, analysts said.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，丰田将因后视摄像头问题召回近 39.4 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，丰田汽车将在美国召回393,838辆汽车，原因是后视摄像头可能无法显示，降低了驾驶员的视野，增加了车祸风险。【原文：Toyota Motor is recalling 393,838 vehicles in the U.S. due to a rearview camera issue that may fail to display, reducing drivers' visibility and increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度将从本周三起为即时数字支付推出生物识别认证技术
item.description: 本周二，三位直接熟悉此事的消息人士称，从 10 月 8 日起，印度将允许用户使用面部识别和指纹批准通过流行的国内支付网络统一支付接口（Unified Payments Interface）进行的支付。【原文：India will allow users to approve payments made through popular domestic payments network, the Unified Payments Interface, using facial recognition and fingerprints starting October 8, three sources directly familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 温斯顿香烟制造商帝国品牌公司推出价值 19.5 亿美元的股票回购计划
item.description: 帝国品牌公司（Imperial Brands）周二宣布了一项额外的 14.5 亿英镑（19.5 亿美元）股票回购计划，并表示在强劲的定价和吸烟替代产品需求增长的支持下，该公司有望实现其年度目标。【原文：Imperial Brands announced an additional 1.45 billion pound ($1.95 billion) share buyback plan on Tuesday and said it was on track to meet its annual targets on the back of strong pricing and growing demand for smoking alternatives products.】

item.title: 荷兰加密货币公司 Amdax 的 AMBTS 获得 3000 万欧元融资
item.description: 荷兰加密货币公司Amdax计划在荷兰交易所推出一家名为AMBTS的比特币财务公司，该公司周二表示，已筹集到3000万欧元（3500万美元）的资金，这凸显了比特币的持久吸引力。【原文：Dutch cryptocurrency company Amdax, which plans to launch a bitcoin treasury company called AMBTS on the Dutch exchange, has raised 30 million euros ($35 million) in financing, it said on Tuesday, highlighting the persistent appeal of Bitcoin.】

item.title: PayPal 首席执行官：印度的 UPI 是其平台上的首个支付系统合作伙伴
item.description: PayPal 首席执行官亚历克斯-克里斯（Alex Chriss）周二表示，印度流行的统一支付界面（UPI）运营商是 PayPal 平台 PayPal World 上的首个支付系统合作伙伴。【原文：The operator of India's popular unified payments interface (UPI) is the first payments system partner onboarded on PayPal's platform PayPal World, CEO Alex Chriss said on Tuesday.】
